titleStmt.title: An exposition of the proper Psalmes vsed in our English liturgie together with a reason why the Church did chuse the same. By Iohn Boys, Doctor of Diuinitie. The first part explaining the Psalmes appointed to be read on Christmas and Easter day.
Exposition of the proper Psalmes used in our English liturgie. Part 1
titleStmt.author: Boys, John, 1571-1625.

notesStmt.note: Bodleian Library copy identified as STC 3467 on UMI microfilm.
